data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Príncipe, São Tomé and Príncipe.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Príncipe, São Tomé and Príncipe
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, help the 298 believers in Príncipe to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Príncipe, São Tomé and Príncipe that you have set your Son over all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked.
data.verse: he raised Christ from the dead and seated him at his right hand in the heavenly realms, far above all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked, not only in the present age but also in the one to come.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 298 believers in Príncipe that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Santo António
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Santo António, Príncipe, São Tomé and Príncipe.
Jesus, make the 4,012 people in the state of Príncipe who claim to know you, brave enough to let the Bible weigh their thoughts and intentions today.
data.verse: For the word of God is living and powerful, and sharper than any two-edged sword, piercing even to the division of soul and spirit, and of joints and marrow, and is a discerner of the thoughts and intents of the heart.

data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Príncipe, São Tomé and Príncipe know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.prayer: Over 13.81 percent of the people of Príncipe are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!
